DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort , monocentric non-randomized interventional clinical study ICU assess evolution body composition use bioelectrical impedance analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Indices Body Composition During Ultramarathon : Measure Body Bioelectrical Impedance
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , monocentric non-randomized interventional clinical study ICU assess evolution body composition use bioelectrical impedance analysis ( phase angle , fat mass , muscle mass , fat-free mass , body water ) ultramarathon .
